channel.title: Dropped item right click option [Delta] [317] [Help]
channel.description: Why does it have ".." as a option. I noticed most customs about 7000+ id has this problem. It bugs me because when there is a drop party, players are going to have to right click for the good stuff. [img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/6889/5whv.png[/img]

item.title: Dropped item right click option [Delta] [317] [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Vodzila Vodzila
item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

Why does it have “…” as a option. I noticed most customs about 7000+ id has this problem. It bugs me because when there is a drop party, players are going to have to right click for the good stuff.

Read full topic
